title: Drawing, "Tree bark Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: On white background, tree bark design in ochre and brown; top left corner is missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tree bark Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-78.
